meanings.definition: The act of thrusting forward or projecting.
meanings.sent1: The obtrusion of the tree branch blocked the path.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't see the road ahead due to the obtrusion of a large rock.
meanings.sent3: The obtrusion of the cat's tail under the door was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The obtrusion of the sun through the clouds was like a bright spotlight.
meanings.sent5: The obtrusion of the mountain on the horizon was breathtaking.
